content.html: Spent 2-3 days trying to solve a huge technical challenge, had no luck. Tried so many things. Finished work, told myself I wasn’t going to think about the problem at all tonight. One hour later, the brain throws a solution up and it’s perfect. Every. Damn. Time.
content.value:
Spent 2-3 days trying to solve a huge technical challenge, had no luck. Tried so many things.

Finished work, told myself I wasn’t going to think about the problem at all tonight.

One hour later, the brain throws a solution up and it’s perfect.

Every. Damn. Time.
